### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) with burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) with burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0))
- Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) with burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) with burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0))
- Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0)) with burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0))

### Lab at position (2.5, 0.5)
Consists of lab (position (2.5, 0.5)) with burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)) and chest (position (2.5, 0.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the target inventory has enough space to insert items before attempting to insert
### Errors when trying to insert items that are not in the inventory
- Make sure the item to be inserted is in the inventory before attempting to insert
### Errors when furnace result is full
- Empty the furnace result inventory before continuing to smelt items
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when fuel source is full
- Ensure the fuel source is not full before continuing to use the entity
### Errors when boiler has no fuel
- Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to continue working
### Errors when trying to research without required items
- Ensure all required items are in the inventory before attempting to research
